description:
This is a market on whether Valtteri Bottas will finish ahead of Sergio Perez in the Formula 1 STC Saudi Arabian Grand Prix 2021, scheduled to take place on December 5, 2021. 

The market will resolve to “Yes” If Valtteri Bottas finishes ahead of Sergio Perez, and “No” otherwise. 

If for any reason the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before December 31, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. 

If the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date after December 31, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50. 

- If Valtteri Bottas finishes the race but Sergio Perez does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Yes.” 
- If Sergio Perez finishes the race but Valtteri Bottas does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “No.” 
- If neither Valtteri Bottas nor Sergio Perez finish the race, then the market will resolve to 50-50.

markets.question: Will Valtteri Bottas finish ahead of Sergio Perez in the Saudi Arabian Gran Prix?

title: Will Valtteri Bottas finish ahead of Sergio Perez in the Saudi Arabian Gran Prix?
